EmailTemplate.name: FML RE Follow Up for 3rd and 4th call
EmailTemplate.subject: Are you participating in The 500 List? -- Forbes Market Leaders
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Don't miss out on the opportunity to appear in Forbes Magazine, in our upcoming Forbes Market Leaders - The 500 List, section. Only 500 real estate agents will be recognized nationally, across 35 metro areas. Packages start at $599, please click the link below for more information.
http://postmarket.fivestarprofessional.com/20/fml_feb_re.html
I look forward to hearing from you!
Regards,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName}
Account Manager
Five Star Professional
{!Contact.OwnerPhone}
{!Contact.OwnerEmail}
www.fivestarprofessional.com
